product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies 15 Day Flashlight - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for your car's glove compartment, your garage tool box and your kitchen junk drawer, the long-running and bright-shining 15 Day Flashlight will be ready in an emergency.
